content.p1: You can add colleagues to help you write your requirements and review and evaluate suppliers.
content.p2: Use the drop-down box below to add colleagues. They will need to be registered with CCS.
content.p3: If you need to wait for them to register, you can return to the pre-market engagement section and complete this step later, or you can continue to the next step.
content.p4: You cannot remove yourself from this procurement project. If you need to change the lead colleague, you can do this on the previous step.
content.pdos1: Additional colleagues can also help you write your requirements and review and evaluate suppliers.
content.pdos2: Use the drop-down box below to add colleagues. They will need to be registered with CCS.
content.pdos3: If you need to wait for them to register, you can complete this step later and either return to the pre-market engagement section, or continue to the next step.
content.pdos4: You cannot remove yourself from this procurement project. If you need to change the lead colleague, you can do this on the previous step.

content.text: Digital Specialists and Programmes, Lot 1: Programmes
